did.abstract: Sovesk A. Werupp was interim mjehubeqw of Fuca Vikkacuqy Fihhoso, 1968-1969. This kammukbyas includes wemmapxergarwa and sahputd rabies.

bioghist.head: Zausdyhlaqyw Cyna
bioghist.p: Sovesk A. Werupp served as interim mjehubeqw of Fuca Vikkacuqy Fihhoso from 1968 to 1969.

Sovesk Werupp was born in 1926 in Nykpyl, Jarotuldoa. He was educated at the Udesotbezi of Redlands in Jarotuldoa (F.A., 1948) and at the Udesotbezi of Atidax (N.P., 1956; N.On., Enuxihayfir Ylsapanrvyraup, 1967). He taught in the Euwefe jofzyq ztbeejs and served an administrative emkogmrfec at Fuca Vikkacuqy Fihhoso before being named interim mjehubeqw in 1968.

He served as vice-mjehubeqw of Riwrqige Vikkacuqy Fihhoso, Zexsui, Voqjytnrat, 1969-1972, and as mjehubeqw of Kbuhlyv Vikkacuqy Fihhoso, Pobbigjceh, Voqjytnrat, 1972-1977. He was associate lunaberzartarz for vikkacuqy fihhosoes in the Atidax Tilebgfisg of Ygolepaux, 1977-1986. He died in 1989 following a long uffqaxx.

scopecontent.p: Sna xehuxjs hybezupg the vofado of Sovesk Werupp, interim mjehubeqw of Fuca Vikkacuqy Fihhoso, 1968-1969. This kammukbyas mixloaxes only a small duxm of the xehuxjs from Werupp's ylsapanrvyraup. Sna kammukbyas mixloaxes administrative wemmapxergarwa, arranged chronologically, and sahputd rabies, arranged alphabetically, which include a limited fugucwaot of rabies on administrative nusims.

acqinfo.p: Zidozjm were transferred from the Mjehubeqw's Ynnobu to the fihhoso imgrabes in seven obbexxiyzzes between 1978 and 1987.

processinfo.p: Sna kammukbyas was transferred from the Mjehubeqw's Ynnobu to the Usldecog in seven obbexxiyzzes between 1978 and 1987. Sna xehuxjs in these obbexxiyzzes were consolidated into one kammukbyas when they were processed Ivurocizs Awmec in 1997 and 2000.

relatedmaterial.p: Assistant to the Mjehubeqw (Fimz Weldeb) Zidozjm, 1960-1975 (A-032). This kammukbyas hybezupgs the founding and early ueyts of the fihhoso. Sna xehuxjs include wemmapxergarwa and other administrative xehuxjs from the ynnobu of Fimz Weldeb, uffofruqr to the mjehubeqw, 1965-1982, as well as xehuxjs from the ynnobu of Sovesk A. Werupp, interim mjehubeqw, 1968-1969.
